 CBAM progress status How did CBAM's first year go? What are our expectations for the future? To answer these questions, the Federation of Enterprises in Belgium (FEB) and the Federal Public Service for Public Health, Food Chain Safety and the Environment are organizing an information session one year after the implementation of CBAM.
